sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_df7711b60fc73100cfaf059ce1050e84
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_teth_ekcm.ekcmExpireCheck</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ekcmExpireCheck</name><script><![CDATA[function ekcmExpireCheck() {
	
    gs.info('EKCM: Expiration Check job started.');
	//Get the Cat Item
	var itemRecord = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
	itemRecord.addQuery('name', 'Managing Digital Certificates');
	itemRecord.query();
	itemRecord.next();
	var Item_sysID = itemRecord.sys_id;

	// Find all Active certs which will expire in the next 3 months
	var ekcmRecord = new GlideRecord('x_teth_ekcm_certificate');
	ekcmRecord.addQuery('install_status', '1');
	ekcmRecord.addEncodedQuery('valid_to<javascript:gs.monthsAgoStart(-3)');
	ekcmRecord.query();

	while (ekcmRecord.next()){
	  // Check for existing RITMs against the expiring cert
	  var ritmRecord = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
	  ritmRecord.addQuery('active', 'true');
	  ritmRecord.addQuery('cmdb_ci', ekcmRecord.sys_id);
	  ritmRecord.query();

 	 if (!ritmRecord.next()) {
		gs.info('EKCM: Create Renewal for '+ekcmRecord.name);

	     // var cartId =  gs.generateGUID(); //GlideGuid.generate(null);
		  
		  var new_cart = new global.Cart();
	      var item = new_cart.addItem(Item_sysID); 
	      new_cart.setVariable(item, 'request_type', 'Renew');
	      new_cart.setVariable(item, 'certificate_record', ekcmRecord.sys_id);
	      new_cart.setVariable(item, 'justification', 'Auto-created, due to certificate expiring in 90 days');

	      var cartUpdate = new_cart.getCart();  
	      cartUpdate.requested_for = ekcmRecord.owned_by;
	      cartUpdate.update();

	      var rc = new_cart.placeOrder(); 
		 
		  gs.info('EKCM: Created Renewal Request '+rc.number+' for '+ekcmRecord.name);
	  }
	}
}

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mpatel</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-03-30 19:56:06</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>df7711b60fc73100cfaf059ce1050e84</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ekcmExpireCheck</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Enterprise Key and Certificate Management" source="x_teth_ekcm">1f9acb620f873100cfaf059ce1050e92</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Enterprise Key and Certificate Management">1f9acb620f873100cfaf059ce1050e92</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_df7711b60fc73100cfaf059ce1050e84</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mpatel</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-04-16 14:00:16</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
